prompt: <description>The CAD Assembly JSON describes the construction of a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered shape, with the narrowest point at the top. The sides of the prism are parallel to each other. Construct the base part of the assembly: <part\\_1> Begin by creating a new coordinate system for part 1. The euler angles are set to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] degrees, and the translation vector is set to [0.1125, 0.0, 0.0]. Now, create the sketch for the base part. The sketch will be drawn on a plane defined by the coordinate system. The sketch contains a single face, face\\_1. Face\\_1 contains a single loop, loop\\_1. Loop\\_1 contains four line segments and one arc. - line\\_1 starts at [0.0, 0.0] and ends at [0.0, 0.375]. - line\\_2 starts at [0.0, 0.375] and ends at [0.0, 0.75]. - line\\_3 starts at [0.0, 0.75] and ends at [0.1486, 0.75]. - arc\\_1 starts at [0.1486, 0.75], has a mid point at [0.1125, 0.375], and ends at [0.1486, 0.0]. - line\\_4 starts at [0.1486, 0.0] and ends at [0.0, 0.0]. The loop is closed and the sketch is fully constrained. Now, extrude the sketch to generate the 3D model for part 1. The extrusion depth towards the normal is 0.75 units, and the opposite normal is 0.0 units. Scale the sketch by 0.75. The operation is to create a new solid body. The resulting shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered shape, with the narrowest point at the top. The sides of the prism are parallel to each other. The length, width, and height of the prism are all approximately 0.75 units.</description>
completion:

{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.1125,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.0,0.375]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.375],"End Point":[0.0,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.75],"End Point":[0.1486,0.75]},"arc_1":{"Start Point":[0.1486,0.75],"Mid Point":[0.1125,0.375],"End Point":[0.1486,0.0]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.1486,0.0],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.75,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
